name: Bacon Brawl
description:
Bacon Brawl

- Slaughter those wolves who want your ham in the the new indie game Bacon Brawl, a fast paced, shoot em' up, 2D platformer.  We hope you enjoy the game as much as we did developing it. Fight on a farm and battle through waves of enemies, and try and survive as many days as possible! Try and take on Challenge Mode for more difficulty and a greater challenge!   

This is a game made for the CFN Game Jam.  

How To Play
  • Use the A and D Keys to move.
  • The Space bar to jump.
  • Hold down the LMB to shoot a Laser Minigun.
  • If your Bacon Bar (Your HP meter) on the top left reaches 0, it's game over.
  • There are 6 species of wolves to fight against.
Update 1.1.1

This update mostly focuses on ridding the game of bugs and glitches.

  • Got rid of the bug  where the menu would not let you play the game
  • Fix map bug that would delete half of the map
  • Solved infinite jump glitch
  • Fixed bug that muted the music
  • Fixed camera glitch that would cause the camera to freak out.
  • Discover the secret. . .

I hope these bug fixes help we always want feedback and please report bugs :D
